name: Cold House
description:
Cold House is a cooperative survival horror game for 1-4 people where you have to survive, solve puzzles and find out the secret of the cold house.
The action takes place in Yakutia, where in winter the air temperature drops below -50 degrees Celsius.
You and your friends get into a car accident and are forced to hide from the cold in an abandoned house, waiting for the warmer, where it will soon turn out that they are not alone at all..
